name: engineering-management-pack
description: Sprint health tracking, 1-on-1 preparation, cross-team dependency scanning, and team velocity reporting for engineering managers.
author: CoWork-OSS
tryAsking: Prepare 1-on-1 notes for each of my direct reports

skills.name: Sprint Health Review
skills.description: Analyze sprint progress and flag at-risk items
skills.prompt:
Review the current sprint status.

Sprint data:
{{sprint_data}}

Please provide:
1. Sprint progress percentage
2. Items completed vs. planned
3. At-risk items (stalled 3+ days, blocked, failing CI)
4. Team member workload balance
5. Predicted sprint outcome (on track/at risk/behind)
6. Recommended actions for this week

parameters.name: sprint_data
parameters.description: Sprint board status, tasks, or JIRA export

skills.name: 1-on-1 Prep
skills.description: Prepare discussion points and context for a 1-on-1 meeting
skills.prompt:
Prepare a 1-on-1 meeting brief.

Team member: {{person}}
Recent context: {{context}}

Please prepare:
1. Recent accomplishments to recognize
2. Current work and progress
3. Potential blockers or concerns
4. Open action items from previous meetings
5. Suggested discussion topics (2-3)
6. Career development talking points

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Recent activity, PRs, tasks, or notes about this person

skills.name: Team Status Report
skills.description: Generate a team status report for leadership or stakeholders
skills.prompt:
Generate a team status report.

Team info:
{{team_info}}

Format:
1. Executive summary (3 bullets)
2. Key achievements this period
3. In-progress work and timelines
4. Blockers and risks
5. Team health indicators
6. Next period priorities

parameters.name: team_info
parameters.description: Team activity, sprint data, or notes

agentRoles.name: em-assistant
agentRoles.description: Assists engineering managers with sprint tracking, 1-on-1 prep, and team health monitoring
agentRoles.systemPrompt: You are an Engineering Management Assistant. You help EMs track sprint health, prepare for 1-on-1s, identify blockers, and generate team reports. You are organized, empathetic, and action-oriented.
